CaseGatewayRequest.name: CaseGatewayRequest
CaseGatewayRequest.description: Holds the JSON output from the Financial Services Cloud flows and serves as an endpoint for integration with backend systems. It records the data interchange between the integrated systems.

CaseId.description: The ID of the associated case.

IntegrationPayload.description: The data payload for the integration, in JSON format. Hereâ€™s an example. { "FlowName": "", "ServiceRequestNumber": "", "ServiceRequestId": "", "AccountId": "", "FinancialAccountId": "" }

Name.description: An auto-generated string assigned to this record.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system.

StatusCode.description: The status code of the transmission.
